languages.text: {n}Соломон прижимает кулак к груди, со всей прямотой глядя вам в глаза. Уставной жест выглядит неожиданно сердечным.{/n} "Для меня было честью служить в вашей свите, и неважно, что лежит впереди. Правда, Глейто?" {n}Несмотря на отсутствие прямой команды, кибермастиф подает голос.{/n}
languages.translation_comment: Соломон салютует, Глейто гавкает два раза
Соломон салютует, Глейто гавкает два раза

languages.text: {n}Solomorne presses his fist to his chest, looking you straight in the eye. The rote gesture looks unexpectedly heartfelt.{/n} "It has been an honour to serve in your retinue, and it does not matter what lies ahead. Isn't that right, Glaito?" {n}Without a direct command, the cyber-mastiff barks his assent.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Соломон прижимает кулак к груди, со всей прямотой глядя вам в глаза. Правда, Глейто?" {n}Несмотря на отсутствие прямой команды, кибермастиф подает голос.{/n}

languages.text: {n}「ソロモーンは拳を胸に当て、あなたの目をまっすぐに見つめた。儀礼的なその動作は、思いのほか心のこもったものに見えた。{/n}「あなたの従者としてお仕えできたことを、光栄に思います。この先に何が待ち受けていようと、それは問題ではありませんそうだろう、グライト？」{n}指示がなくても、サイバーマスチフは賛意を示すように吠えた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne presses his fist to his chest, looking you straight in the eye. The rote gesture looks unexpectedly heartfelt.{/n} "It has been an honour to serve in your retinue, and it does not matter what lies ahead. Isn't that right, Glaito?" {n}Without a direct command, the cyber-mastiff barks his assent.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}「ソロモーンは拳を胸に当て、あなたの目をまっすぐに見つめた。儀礼的なその動作は、思いのほか心のこもったものに見えた。{/n}「あなたの従者としてお仕えできたことを、光栄に思います。この先に何が待ち受けていようと、それは問題ではありませんそうだろう、グライト？」{n}指示がなくても、サイバーマスチフは賛意を示すように吠えた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomorne presst eine Faust an die Brust und blickt dir direkt in die Augen. Die mechanische Geste wirkt unerwartet innig.{/n} "Es war eine Ehre, in Eurem Gefolge zu dienen, und es spielt keine Rolle, was kommen wird. Ist es nicht so, Glaito?" {n}Obwohl ohne direkten Befehl, bellt der Cyber-Mastiff zustimmend.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne presses his fist to his chest, looking you straight in the eye. The rote gesture looks unexpectedly heartfelt.{/n} "It has been an honour to serve in your retinue, and it does not matter what lies ahead. Isn't that right, Glaito?" {n}Without a direct command, the cyber-mastiff barks his assent.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne presst eine Faust an die Brust und blickt dir direkt in die Augen. Die mechanische Geste wirkt unerwartet innig.{/n} "Es war eine Ehre, in Eurem Gefolge zu dienen, und es spielt keine Rolle, was kommen wird. Ist es nicht so, Glaito?" {n}Obwohl ohne direkten Befehl, bellt der Cyber-Mastiff zustimmend.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomorne place son poing sur sa poitrine et plonge son regard dans le vôtre. Mais derrière ce salut militaire, vous percevez une véritable sincérité.{/n} « Cela a été un véritable honneur d'intégrer votre entourage, et qu'importe l'avenir qui nous attend. N'est-ce pas, Glaito ? » {n}Sans même recevoir d'ordre direct, le cyber-mastiff marque son approbation d'un aboiement.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne presses his fist to his chest, looking you straight in the eye. The rote gesture looks unexpectedly heartfelt.{/n} "It has been an honour to serve in your retinue, and it does not matter what lies ahead. Isn't that right, Glaito?" {n}Without a direct command, the cyber-mastiff barks his assent.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne place son poing sur sa poitrine et plonge son regard dans le vôtre. Mais derrière ce salut militaire, vous percevez une véritable sincérité.{/n} « Cela a été un véritable honneur d'intégrer votre entourage, et qu'importe l'avenir qui nous attend. N'est-ce pas, Glaito ? » {n}Sans même recevoir d'ordre direct, le cyber-mastiff marque son approbation d'un aboiement.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomorne se lleva el puño al pecho y te mira fijamente a los ojos. El ensayado gesto se te antoja inesperadamente genuino.{/n} «Ha sido un honor formar parte de su séquito, y no me importa lo que me depare el futuro. ¿Verdad que no, Glaito?». {n}El cibermastín asiente con un ladrido sin necesidad de recibir orden alguna.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne presses his fist to his chest, looking you straight in the eye. The rote gesture looks unexpectedly heartfelt.{/n} "It has been an honour to serve in your retinue, and it does not matter what lies ahead. Isn't that right, Glaito?" {n}Without a direct command, the cyber-mastiff barks his assent.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne se lleva el puño al pecho y te mira fijamente a los ojos. El ensayado gesto se te antoja inesperadamente genuino.{/n} «Ha sido un honor formar parte de su séquito, y no me importa lo que me depare el futuro. ¿Verdad que no, Glaito?». {n}El cibermastín asiente con un ladrido sin necesidad de recibir orden alguna.{/n}

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙一只手握成了拳，放在胸前，直视着你的眼睛。这个原本带有规矩意味的手势，此刻却充满了发自内心的情感。{/n}“能成为你的随行人员是我的荣幸，无论前方有什么，我都不在乎。没错吧，格雷托？”{n}没等索罗蒙下令，格雷托便吠叫起来，表示赞同。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne presses his fist to his chest, looking you straight in the eye. The rote gesture looks unexpectedly heartfelt.{/n} "It has been an honour to serve in your retinue, and it does not matter what lies ahead. Isn't that right, Glaito?" {n}Without a direct command, the cyber-mastiff barks his assent.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙一只手握成了拳，放在胸前，直视着你的眼睛。这个原本带有规矩意味的手势，此刻却充满了发自内心的情感。{/n}“能成为你的随行人员是我的荣幸，无论前方有什么，我都不在乎。没错吧，格雷托？”{n}没等索罗蒙下令，格雷托便吠叫起来，表示赞同。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomorne, yumruğunu göğsüne bastırıyor. Doğrudan gözlerinin içine bakıyor. Ezbere yapılmış gibi duran bu hareket, beklenmedik bir şekilde samimi hissettiriyor.{/n} "Maiyetinde hizmet etmek bir onurdu. Gelecekte ne olursa olsun, bu fikrim değişmeyecek. Değil mi Glaito?" {n}Doğrudan emir almamış olsa da siber mastif, havlayarak onaylıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne presses his fist to his chest, looking you straight in the eye. The rote gesture looks unexpectedly heartfelt.{/n} "It has been an honour to serve in your retinue, and it does not matter what lies ahead. Isn't that right, Glaito?" {n}Without a direct command, the cyber-mastiff barks his assent.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne, yumruğunu göğsüne bastırıyor. Doğrudan gözlerinin içine bakıyor. Ezbere yapılmış gibi duran bu hareket, beklenmedik bir şekilde samimi hissettiriyor.{/n} "Maiyetinde hizmet etmek bir onurdu. Gelecekte ne olursa olsun, bu fikrim değişmeyecek. Değil mi Glaito?" {n}Doğrudan bir emir almadan siber mastif onaylayarak havlıyor.{/n}
